Header 1

This is an R Markdown document.

Use an asterisk mark, to provide emphasis such as *italics* and **bold**.

Create lists with a dash:
- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3

You can write `in-line` code with a back-tick.

```
Code blocks display with
a fixed-width fonts
```

> Block quotes are offset

And code can be evaluated 1 + 1 = `r 1 + 1`

Equations can be embedded, such as:

  $\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i}$

Hyperlinks can be [included](https://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/rmarkdown-cheatsheet.pdf).
